thread.title: Centrica receives consent for exploration drilling (Petroleum Safety Authority Norway)
thread.title_full: Centrica receives consent for exploration drilling (Petroleum Safety Authority Norway) - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Centrica receives consent for exploration drilling (Petroleum Safety Authority Norway)
text: ( Source : Petroleum Safety Authority Norway ) Centrica has received consent to drill a shallow borehole to investigate the possible presence of shallow gas in block 8/10 . Centrica Resources ( Norge ) AS (Centrica) is the operator of production
